                SEO Frequently Asked Questions

                
                
                Let’s Answer Your Questions About  Healthcare SEO 

                
                
            
        
    

    
    
        

            
            

                
                
                    
                        Why is SEO important for healthcare?
                                            
                    
                        
                            When a medical need emerges, the first place healthcare consumers go for information is a search engine. Will they find your brand on page one? If not, search engine optimization (SEO) can help you get there. 
SEO is the process of optimizing or improving your webpage, so it ranks higher on search engines. This is why healthcare SEO should be one of the main focus points for healthcare groups. A solid SEO strategy will establish your brand as a medical authority and help you build a sustainable pipeline of new patients. SEO puts your hospital, treatment center, nursing facility, or practice in front of healthcare consumers searching for your services.
                        
                    
                

                
                
                    
                        What kind of results can I expect from Cardinal’s SEO services?
                                            
                    
                        
                            No matter how you choose to engage us, you can expect comprehensive, data-driven results that were expertly planned for and meticulously worked towards. Whether that’s increased leads and patient volume, higher levels of organic traffic, or better search rankings, we’ll set a goal at the beginning of each project and won’t stop until we’ve met it.
                        
                    
                

                
                
                    
                        What’s the difference between AISO, AEO, and GEO, and which should I focus on?
                                            
                    
                        
                            So, here’s the scoop:
AISO (AI Search Optimization) is all about making sure your content shows up in AI-powered search engines like ChatGPT and Google Gemini. It helps your content get discovered by AI systems that are changing the way people search.
AEO (AI Engine Optimization) takes things a step further by tweaking how your content is structured so that search engines better understand it and serve it up to the right audience.
GEO (Generative Engine Optimization) focuses on getting your content referenced and cited in AI-generated results. It’s about being seen and included in the kind of conversational search experiences people are increasingly using.
Which should you focus on? It depends on your business goals. If you’re just starting out with AI search, you’ll want to prioritize AISO and AEO to make sure your content is visible and well-structured. But if you’re looking to position your brand at the forefront and get cited in those generative AI results, GEO should be your focus. It’s about understanding where your brand can get the most visibility.
                        
                    
                

                
                
                    
                        How can my brand appear in AI-generated answers and overviews?
                                            
                    
                        
                            To appear in AI-generated answers, focus on creating high-quality, relevant content that aligns with user intent. AI search engines like Google’s AI Overviews and ChatGPT pull from sources like your Google Business Profile, reviews, and third-party content. Optimize your content to be authoritative, specific, and clear, and manage your online reputation, as AI looks at sentiment and user feedback too. By focusing on trust and differentiation, your brand can be cited in AI-driven answers.
                        
                    
                

                
                
                    
                        Is AI SEO worth investing in?
                                            
                    
                        
                            Yes, investing in AI SEO is essential as search behavior shifts toward AI-driven results. Traditional SEO isn’t enough anymore. AI search engines prioritize relevance, intent, and trust over keywords. By optimizing for AI, you ensure your brand appears in AI-generated recommendations and stays competitive in the evolving search landscape.
                        
                    
                

                
                
                    
                        How do you measure AI SEO success?
                                            
                    
                        
                            Measuring your ranking in AI search engines is a bit different from traditional SEO. Instead of just tracking clicks, you’ll want to track your AI visibility—how often your brand is mentioned in AI-generated summaries or answers. You can use tools to track sentiment (how AI talks about your brand) and AI referral traffic (how many people are coming to your site from AI-driven results). It’s all about measuring your presence, perception, and performance in the AI space, as AI is looking at more than just keyword rankings now. It’s also about how your content is presented and perceived across AI platforms.
                        
                    
                

                
                
                    
                        How long does it take to see ROI for SEO services?
                                            
                    
                        
                            We set performance-based goals for all our clients every three months, and you’ll typically start to see your SEO services pay off in about 3-6 months—though quick fixes can happen immediately. For example, if we see obvious issues with duplicative content, 404 error pages, or unclaimed Google Business Profiles (GBPs), we can fix those within the first month. 
We create robust SEO roadmaps, so you have complete transparency into your SEO strategy, the activities that support it, and the expected impact.
                        
                    
                

                
                
                    
                        Do I need to create a Google Business Profile for each location AND provider?
                                            
                    
                        
                            For multi-location healthcare groups, we recommend that you only create Google Business Profiles for each location. If you create GBPs for both locations AND providers, it can create cannibalization issues. Some providers might outrank the overall location and hurt visibility to other providers in the group, for example. It gets messy, real quick.
Don’t confuse users and Google. Create GBPs for locations only. You can highlight providers at the locations by using healthcare directories like Healthgrades, RateMDs, ZocDoc, etc.
                        
                    
                

                
                
                    
                        What are the top SEO considerations for merging sites to ensure I don’t lose rankings or traffic?
                                            
                    
                        
                            Merging healthcare brands is a multi-step process, even beyond SEO. First, we recommend you get access to the acquired brand’s Google Analytics and Search Console. You need benchmark data for at least three months. This will help you understand how performance is impacted after the migration. Then, it’s time to build a robust redirect map so Google can re-index pages appropriately.  
This is a big undertaking, and we recommend the help of experts to ensure no loss in rankings.

                A New Age of Healthcare Consumers 

                
                
                Why  TikTok  for Healthcare?

                
                
            

            
            
                Social media is quickly becoming a go-to place for healthcare advice, particularly for younger Americans. Because Gen-Z consumers are aging into adulthood and making their own healthcare decisions for the first time, TikTok is playing an important role in the patient journey.
Unlike traditional corporate channels, TikTok feels more authentic and credible due to the prevalence of user-generated content that is easy to understand and relate to. It provides a strong sense of community, allowing users to connect with others who share similar experiences and seek support.
By leveraging TikTok, healthcare providers can connect with younger patients, as well as Millennial parents (aged 30-45) who are making healthcare decisions for themselves and their children.
            

            
            
        

        
        
            

                
            
        

        
    







    
    

    

        
        
            
                

                    
                    How We Engage Patients on TikTok

                        Funnel-Based Messaging Strategies
                        
                            We deploy funnel-based nurture strategies to reach your engaged Gen-Z and Millennial patients with a clear message at the perfect time. Every patient’s journey to receive care is unique and requires a custom full-funnel TikTok strategy. We help you capture their attention and nurture them with real, engaging videos until they’re ready to book an appointment! 
                        
                    

                    
                    
                        
                        Video Content Strategy
                        
                            From ideation to production, we help you develop a cutting-edge video content strategy. Let us do the heavy lifting; we’ll create storyboards, write your scripts, and plan video shoots. We’ll film it ourselves or work with your in-house team to produce unique content that your patients will love. By conducting creative research and using performance data, we’ll refine your video strategy and use those insights to inform other marketing initiatives.
                        
                    

                    
                    
                        
                        Authentic Designs
                        
                            Our creative video designs are not only scroll-stopping but also capture the hearts of patients with genuine authenticity. We collaborate with you to craft native-feeling, user-generated content your audience will trust. No stuffy, corporate bullshit.
                        
                    

                    
                    
                        
                        HIPAA-Compliant Ads
                        
                            Worried that your ads won’t be HIPAA compliant? Don’t be! We know how to navigate every HIPAA regulation to ensure your ad campaigns don’t violate patient privacy restrictions. 
                        
                    

                    
                    
                        
                        Post-Click Optimizations
                        
                            We’ll supercharge conversions by aligning pre and post-click user experiences. User research and testing allow us to apply pre-click test learnings to your post-click landing page. We continue testing content, structure, and imagery across your post-click landing page and other key pages to convert clicks into booked patients.
                        
                    

                    
                    
                        
                        Audience Enhancements and Optimization Strategies
                        
                            We’re optimization obsessed and evaluate how different ads perform among various TikTok audiences. Once we’ve determined performance by the audience, we divide the top-performing ads to hone in on which content resonates with each audience.

                TikTok Advertising Frequently Asked Questions 

                
                
                TikTok is a  new channel  for healthcare. Get answers for all your burning questions.

                
                
            
        
    

    
    
        

            
            

                
                
                    
                        What makes TikTok advertising worth the money?
                                            
                    
                        
                            Let’s be clear, TikTok marketing isn’t the right option for every single healthcare specialty. Not every specialty is the right fit for the demography. The healthcare specialties that tend to thrive on TikTok consist of mental health, addiction treatment, cosmetic dentistry, pediatrics, dermatology, plastic surgery, and women’s health. 
All things aside, if your organization is looking to connect with younger patients, drive revenue through targeted campaigns, and natively build your brand through UGC, a TikTok advertising strategy that works well is worth the money. It all comes down to if your target patient population is on the channel and how valuable they are to your business. 
                        
                    
                

                
                
                    
                        What does a TikTok marketing agency do?
                                            
                    
                        
                            The real question is: what don’t we do? A TikTok marketing agency ensures your TikTok ads reach potential and existing patients to drive real results to your business. We start by creating a custom assessment of your goals, target audience(s), location, and messaging. We’ll devise a video content strategy based on trend research, patient engagement, and performance data. Our team will even create short-form video content for you—see more below. Once the plan is in motion, we monitor your TikTok ad performance with custom dashboard reports and continually optimize campaigns to ensure a steady stream of patients. If that all sounds like a win, that’s because it is!
                        
                    
                

                
                
                    
                        Who makes the content for TikTok ads?
                                            
                    
                        
                            We do it, or you can! Our team will get to know you through the initial discovery process and familiarize ourselves with your offerings, style, and tone of voice. Once we get a feel for your brand, we’ll storyboard, write, plan, and shoot. We can capture video for you or collaborate with your creative team to capture video content. We also can help you source user-generated content from your patients to build authentic patient testimonial campaigns. 
                        
                    
                

                
                
                    
                        How long are the contract terms?
                                            
                    
                        
                            We want you to be completely confident that you’re getting your money’s worth for your TikTok marketing, so we contract accordingly. It takes a few months of testing and optimizing to establish a steady, predictable pattern of results. We’ll sign you on for an initial six-month contract to set the magic in motion. Throughout this time, we set performance-based goals for all our clients every 3 months, staying in constant communication with clients and continually monitoring performance to ensure they’re getting the results they expect.

                Featured Client Case Study

                
                
                Southern Veterinary Partners

                
                
            

            
            
                Southern Veterinary Partners (SVP) is a veterinarian-owned and operated network of animal hospitals with 420 locations currently open nationwide. As a massive house of brands, each SVP hospital location remains locally branded and committed to its community, maintaining a unique identity while benefiting from the support of the larger network.
Since 2021, SVP has partnered with Cardinal to build a scalable paid media framework that supports continual expansion and growth while maintaining cost efficiency and profitability.
Through refined budgeting, operational alignment, and continuous campaign optimizations, SVP has seen strong year-over-year (Jan-Nov 2023 to 2024) growth, with new leads increasing by 54% and ROAS improving by 11%.
            

            
            
            

                
                Read the Full Case Study

                
            

            
        

        
        
            

                
            
        

        
    







    
    

    

        
        
            
                

                    
                    The Blueprint To Success

                    
                    
                    Veterinary Marketing Success From Every Angle

                    
                    
                
            
        

        
        
            

                
                

                    
                    
                        
                        PPC Advertising

                        
                        PPC Advertising
                        
                            The goal of paid search is to drive more prospective clients to your website and convert those qualified leads into new patients. This is why we personalize each pay-per-click campaign to target people actively searching for the veterinary services you offer while maximizing your budget. Hello high ROI!
                        
                    

                    
                    
                        
                        SEO

                        
                        SEO
                        
                            In today’s competitive marketplace, your veterinary hospital’s website needs search engine optimization (SEO). If your site is not highly ranked, prospective patients will not find you. Most searchers never make it past the first page. Cardinal will target specific keywords and markets to get your search rankings where they need to be.
                        
                    

                    
                    
                        
                        Facebook Ads

                        
                        Facebook Ads
                        
                            Paid social platforms such as Facebook have millions of users in the U.S.; tapping into this market can help you reach the people interested in the treatments you offer. We use segmentation to identify prospective clients based on location, age, gender, and estimated income to offer you high conversion rates and qualified leads.
                        
                    

                    
                    
                        
                        CRO

                        
                        CRO
                        
                            So you’ve got a lot of people visiting your veterinary practice’s website, but you’re not getting that many phone calls, consultations, or appointments. Don’t fret! A strong conversion rate optimization (CRO) strategy can help increase the quality of your leads and make the most out of the traffic you’re already receiving.
                        
                    

                    
                    
                        
                        Analytics

                        
                        Analytics
                        
                            If you’re not tracking your veterinary practice’s website data, you will never be able to tell which campaigns are driving results, which offers are working, and which pages need better optimization. At Cardinal, we’re passionate about monitoring performance and communicating results; you’ll receive access to all of your data, dashboards, and reports. We don’t just make numbers look pretty; we believe in complete transparency and chart marketing performance against your business goals.
                        
                    

                    
                    
                        
                        Web Design

                        
                        Web Design
                        
                            The first place patients go to find a new veterinarian is online. Whether they find your practice through SEO, PPC, or word-of-mouth, make sure your website loads quickly and is easy to navigate. First impressions go far. Your website not only needs to be sleek and well optimized, but it needs to be responsive across all devices. We make sure that once a web visitor finds your website, they can quickly find the information they are looking for, whether that be on their desktop or mobile device. BAM – hello higher conversion rates and new patients!
                        
                    

                    
                

                
                
            
        
    






    
    

    

        
        
            
                

                    
                    Veterinary Marketing Matters

                    
                    
                    We Help You Clear the Path to Better Pet Care

We bring all your marketing data together in one place, giving you clear insights to make smarter decisions and grow your veterinary organization.

                            Pet owners don’t want “corporate vet” experiences—they want the familiarity and trust of their local vet. We help you build authentic local connections to ensure your practice resonates with the communities you serve.

                        

                        
                    

                    

                    
                    

                        
                        

                            
                        
                        
                        
                                                        
                                                                    Tackling Staffing Shortages                                                                

                                                        


                            
                                                        
                        

                        


                        

                        
                        

                            Staffing shortages are hitting vet clinics hard, leaving teams stretched thin and pets turned away. We help you stand out to top candidates with smart recruitment marketing strategies, ensuring you attract skilled vets and support staff.

                        

                        
                    

                    

                    
                
            
        

        
    







    
    


    
    
        
            

                
                
                Frequently Asked Questions

                
                
            
        
    

    
    
        

            
            

                
                
                    
                         Do I need a brand-new website to market my veterinary clinic?
                                            
                    
                        
                            No. We can start crafting your marketing campaign if you have a functional WordPress website with a good design and structure. We always recommend WordPress to our clients because it’s easy to use, highly customizable, has a well-designed backend, and is SEO-friendly. Otherwise, we may have to deal with optimization challenges and not reach your campaign’s full potential.
If your website could be better designed and structured, our talented web design specialists will help transfer your website to WordPress from any platform or even make a brand-new site from scratch. We can guarantee a professional-looking website that loads quickly, has strong SEO foundations, and works perfectly on both desktop and mobile.
Furthermore, your veterinary website will contain all the necessary information that visitors need and be gently guided toward your conversion funnels–this means higher conversion rates and more kitties and puppies to care for.
                        
                    
                

                
                
                    
                        Will it take too long before I can see actual results?
                                            
                    
                        
                            It depends on what you consider “too long.” One thing you need to know about digital marketing is that it takes time. It’s a multi-pronged approach consisting of various long-term strategies that take time to develop and execute. This is why we always encourage our clients to manage their expectations about their campaign results. If you want immediate results from your campaign, Cardinal is not the agency for you.
Regarding the timeframe of results, they will largely depend on the current state of your marketing, your competition, and your required services. For example, a PPC campaign is quick to launch and may yield favorable results within 30 days after optimization, but a more realistic estimate would be 90 days. On the other hand, a full-scale SEO plan may take 4-6 months to a year before it produces meaningful results.
We always set performance-based goals for all our clients every three months. To help ensure transparency, we provide in-depth reports, KPIs, dashboards, and strategy roadmaps you can always access.
                        
                    
                

                
                
                    
                        Will Cardinal handle all areas of marketing for my veterinary clinic?
                                            
                    
                        
                            We can if you want us to.
As a full-service digital marketing agency, Cardinal doesn’t just offer a wide range of services to grow your vet clinic; we also deliver integrated and cohesive campaigns that integrate all our core services. From SEO to PPC management to conversion rate optimization to Facebook advertising, you can trust that every service you hire us for will support each other to achieve your goals. However, we do not provide email marketing, social media posts, and traditional “offline” advertising (we’re a digital agency, after all).
What makes us stand out from a sea of digital marketing agencies is our expertise and experience in the healthcare arena. Our services are trusted by some of the most prominent names in the veterinary field, and we have the results from successful campaigns to back up our claims.
                        
                    
                

                
                
                    
                        We’re getting good traffic to our veterinary website, but patient growth remains stagnant. How can you help?
                                            
                    
                        
                            Your current digital marketing campaign may not drive more qualified leads to your website, so it’s undoubtedly a conversion rate issue. Fortunately, conversion rate optimization, or CRO, is one of our core services.
For starters, we’ll evaluate if there’s a mismatch between your ad messaging and landing pages or if you’re using the wrong set of keywords. There’s a good chance you’re still linking your PPC ads to your home page or generic service pages, which is a common mistake. One step to correct this is to create conversion-focused landing pages that align with your ads.
If people don’t find what they’re looking for after clicking one of your ads, they’ll quickly bounce. Cardinal will help optimize conversions by developing landing pages that match your ad messaging and search intent.
                        
                    
                

                
                
                    
                        Can you market my vet clinic to focus on unexpected high-value services like emergency surgeries or wound treatment?
                                            
                    
                        
                            Yes, we can. As your marketing partner, one of our goals is to support your priority service lines.
If you want to attract patients looking for high-value veterinary services (e.g., wound treatment, bloodwork, emergency surgery, etc.), we can focus on targeting them first, then work our way toward your general service lines.
Through our specialty marketing solutions like SEO and PPC, we can increase awareness for your veterinary clinic and put it in front of people who need help for their pups and kittens. We enhance the results of these core strategies by crafting a customized veterinary marketing plan which will result in higher-quality leads and better conversion rates.
